ingredients.name: Whole Grain Oats
ingredients.description: Whole grain oats are the seeds of the oat plant, consumed as a cereal grain. They are a good source of dietary fiber and various nutrients.

research_papers.title: Synergetic effects of Lactobacillus plantarum and Rhizopus oryzae on physicochemical, nutritional and antioxidant properties of whole-grain oats (Avena sativa L.) during solid-state fermentation
Impact of whole grains on the gut microbiota: the next frontier for oats?
Oats, more than just a whole grain: an introduction

ingredients.name: Sugar
ingredients.description: Sugar, also known as sucrose or table sugar, is a naturally occurring carbohydrate found in many plants. It is widely used as a sweetener in food and beverages.

research_papers.title: Top Value Added Chemicals from Biomass: Volume I -- Results of Screening for Potential Candidates from Sugars and Synthesis Gas
Evidence for sugar addiction: Behavioral and neurochemical effects of intermittent, excessive sugar intake

ingredients.name: MSG
ingredients.description: MSG, or monosodium glutamate, is a sodium salt of the amino acid glutamic acid. It's used as a flavor enhancer in many foods.

warnings: May cause neurological effects at high doses or chronic exposure, including memory impairment and neuronal injury (particularly in animal models)
May contribute to obesity and metabolic dysfunction through appetite dysregulation and altered hypothalamic signaling
May induce kidney damage at high doses or prolonged intake
May trigger transient symptoms (headache, flushing) in sensitive individuals when consumed in large amounts without food

research_papers.title: MSG-GAN: Multi-Scale Gradients for Generative Adversarial Networks
Monosodium glutamate (MSG)-obese rats develop glucose intolerance and insulin resistance to peripheral glucose uptake
A new Saharan dust source activation frequency map derived from MSG‐SEVIRI IR‐channels

ingredients.name: Palm Oil
ingredients.description: Palm oil is an edible vegetable oil derived from the fruit of the oil palm tree. It is widely used in food processing and other industries.

research_papers.title: Kinetics of palm oil transesterification in a batch reactor
Palm oil refining
Biological and Nutritional Properties of Palm Oil and Palmitic Acid: Effects on Health

ingredients.name: Cocoa Powder
ingredients.description: Cocoa powder is a product derived from cocoa beans after removing the cocoa butter. It is commonly used as a flavoring ingredient and source of antioxidants in many foods.

research_papers.title: Effects of cocoa powder and dark chocolate on LDL oxidative susceptibility and prostaglandin concentrations in humans
Cocoa powder enhances the level of antioxidative activity in rat plasma
Continuous intake of polyphenolic compounds containing cocoa powder reduces LDL oxidative susceptibility and has beneficial effects on plasma HDL-cholesterol concentrations in humans

ingredients.name: Whey Protein Concentrate
ingredients.description: Whey protein concentrate is a byproduct of cheese production. It is a rich source of protein and is often used as a dietary supplement or ingredient in various food products.

research_papers.title: Whey Protein Concentrate Edible Film Activated with Cinnamon Essential Oil
Microstructural, textural, and sensory characteristics of probiotic yogurts fortified with sodium calcium caseinate or whey protein concentrate
Production of antioxidant hydrolyzates from a whey protein concentrate with thermolysin: Optimization by response surface methodology

ingredients.name: Skim Milk
ingredients.description: Skim milk is cow's milk that has had most of its fat removed. It is a good source of protein and calcium.

research_papers.title: An extensive outbreak of staphylococcal food poisoning due to low-fat milk in Japan: estimation of enterotoxin A in the incriminated milk and powdered skim milk
The Purification of a Lipoprotein Lipase from Bovine Skim Milk
Dissociation of the glycaemic and insulinaemic responses to whole and skimmed milk

ingredients.name: Soy Lecithin
ingredients.description: Soy lecithin is a phospholipid derived from soybeans. It is widely used as an emulsifier in food products.

research_papers.title: Oxidative Stability of Egg and Soy Lecithin as Affected by Transition Metal Ions and pH in Emulsion
Catastrophic inversion and rheological behavior in soy lecithin and Tween 80 based food emulsions

ingredients.name: Salt
ingredients.description: Salt, primarily sodium chloride, is a common seasoning and preservative used in various food products. It enhances flavor and inhibits microbial growth.

research_papers.title: Improving crop salt tolerance
Comparative physiology of salt and water stress
Bile salt biotransformations by human intestinal bacteria

ingredients.name: Natural Flavors
ingredients.description: Natural flavors are substances derived from natural sources, such as fruits, spices, or herbs, that impart flavor to food products.

research_papers.title: Yukawa alignment from natural flavor conservation
Updated procedure for the safety evaluation of natural flavor complexes used as ingredients in food
FEMA GRAS assessment of natural flavor complexes: Citrus-derived flavoring ingredients

ingredients.name: Artificial Flavors
ingredients.description: Artificial flavors are synthetically produced substances that mimic the taste and aroma of natural flavors.

research_papers.title: Liquid Chromatographic Determination of Methyl Anthranilate in Artificially Flavored Nonalcoholic Beverages

ingredients.name: BHT
ingredients.description: BHT, or butylated hydroxytoluene, is a synthetic antioxidant used as a food preservative to prevent rancidity.

research_papers.title: The influence of BHA, BHT and TBHQ on the oxidation stability of soybean oil ethyl esters (biodiesel)

ingredients.name: Milk
ingredients.description: Milk is a nutrient-rich liquid produced by mammals. It is widely consumed as a beverage and used in various food products.

research_papers.title: Spectrophotometric Assay Using o-Phthaldialdehyde for Determination of Proteolysis in Milk and Isolated Milk Proteins
Exosomes with Immune Modulatory Features Are Present in Human Breast Milk

ingredients.name: Soy
ingredients.description: Soy is a legume and a source of protein and isoflavones. It is used in various forms in human diets.

research_papers.title: The Clinical Importance of the Metabolite Equol—A Clue to the Effectiveness of Soy and Its Isoflavones

ingredients.name: E951
ingredients.description: Aspartame, also known as E951, is an artificial sweetener used as a sugar substitute in many foods and beverages.
